name: Pop It 3D master fidgets
description:
Pop it is the best bubble popping stress reliever app

A huge variety of levels and game modes awaits you. Pop all the bubbles to go to the next simple dimple.

Tap the bubbles with your fingers and don't forget to rotate the toy to complete the level.

Pop it will help relieve stress, improve mood. Pop it is rich in content, bright design and quality sound.

The most famous simple dimple models are already in this game.

Relax with the best relaxation app. A variety of game modes are waiting for you to challenge.

The game includes:
- Relaxing music
- Realistic Pop it sound
- Colorful models
- Various textures
- Beautiful background
- Game modes
